page.title: 20"Bawtry News"
page.content:
This magazine is published bimonthly by an editorial committee representative of the whole community. Contributions are welcomed from members of the public and include news of the school,Cubs,Scouts and sports activities.There are a substantial number of advertisements from local firms.The glossy front cover is illustrated with a line drawing. Photographs and drawing are included inside.
This block has been studied by a group of 8 and 9 year old girls who attend St. Mary's School,Bawtry Road,Doncaster.Form Three's teacher ,Mrs Julia Walsh has guided them in their research.
